EmpBenefitSummary.name: EmpBenefitSummary
EmpBenefitSummary.description: Represents statistics about benefits provided to employees and the usage of benefits.

BenefitUsage.description: Specifies the status of the benefit that's used by the employee.

Country.description: Specifies the country of the employee for whom the benefits information is provided.

Description.description: The description of the employee benefit statistics.

DisclsReportingPeriodId.description: The unique identifier of the reporting period.

EmployeeBenefitType.description: Specifies the type of benefit offered by the organization.

EmployeeCount.description: The number of employees receiving the benefit.

EmployeePercentage.description: The percentage of employees receiving the benefit.

Gender.description: Specifies the gender of the employee for whom the benefits information is provided.

IsEmployeeEligible.description: Indicates whether the employee is eligible for the benefit (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PercentageCalcType.description: Specifies the type of calculation used to determine the percentage of employees who received the benefit.

PrimaryLocation.description: The primary location from where the organization operates.

SubsidiaryAccountId.description: The account that's identified as a subsidiary company.
